div.style: padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; width: 1519.2px; opacity: 1; margin-left: -160px; min-height: 0px;

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving
vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text
vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text

div.style: background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: scroll; background-size: auto; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;

div.p: The «SKILLNT – Sector Skills Network of VET centres in Advanced Manufacturing» project is KA3- Support for Policy Reform project, supported by the European Commission and covering the whole EU-27 territory plus several countries outside the EU borders. It aims at:

div.style: background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: scroll; background-size: auto; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;

ul.li: Encourage the creation of transnational and national networks and partnerships of VET providers to improve the quality and efficiency of VET at national and European levels, increase their impact and relevance to learners and employers, and build cross-border cooperation for the quality and attractiveness of VET

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInLeft fadeInLeft wpb_start_animation animated

a.class: vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey dt-pswp-item rollover rollover-zoom pspw-wrap-ready this-ready

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_center wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInRight fadeInRight wpb_start_animation animated

a.class: vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey dt-pswp-item rollover rollover-zoom pspw-wrap-ready this-ready

ul.li: Promote communication, dissemination and support for the implementation of the VET policy agenda at European and national levels, to exchange knowledge, feedbacks and experiences on policy implementation and sharing of best practices on VET excellence

div.style: background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: scroll; background-size: auto; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;

div.p: Skillman.eu, coordinator and leader of the transnational platform of centers of vocational excellence for the emerging skills in Advanced Manufacturing.
IVETA, International VET Association for the advancement and improvement of high-quality VET throughout the world.
European Network of Innovation for Inclusion, a community of over 300 organizations in 24 EU countries aimed at building a more innovative social inclusive ecosystem.
EAPRIL, European Association for Practitioner Research on Improving Learning.

div.style: background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: scroll; background-size: auto; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;

div.p: The expected impacts of the project outside the organizations directly participating in the project are in particular:

ul.li: the increase in the designing and piloting of new curriculum and units of learning addressing evidence-based future needs skills in the Advanced Manufacturing sector
the increase of the number of VET professionals using EU tools and frameworks (ECVET, EQAVET, ESCO, etc…)
the increase of the VET providers using evidence-based skills foresight exercise in order to address actual and future skills needs in Advanced Manufacturing.
the reduction of the skill shortage in the Advanced Manufacturing sector at EU level

the reduction of the time lag connected to the occurrence of a technological innovation, triggering new or substantially different skill requirements and the point in time when the first cohorts leave the education system with these new skill profiles.

div.style: background-position: center top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: scroll; background-size: auto; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; min-height: 0px;

div.strong: The main aim of the WP1 was the general coordination of the project and the set up of the tools that will facilitate the coordination and management of the project.

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%;

span.strong: These actions are deployed: to raise the attractiveness of VET; to support the development of an internationalisation strategy; to support, in one side, the micro companies and the SMEs in upskilling and reskilling their employees and, in the other side, to boost the VET providers in the capacity to revise their curricula and learning offer, fostering innovative learning of key competences; and finally, to realise train of the trainers activities

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%;

span.strong: D28 – 32 EUROPEAN VOCATIONAL SKILLS WEEK SEMINARS

strong.span: VET innovation cafè, were realised in a virtual way during SIF 2020 and SIF 2021

a.span: D32 – Official skillnet project EUROPEAN VOCATIONAL SKILLS WEEK page

strong.span: D34 – Tailored trainings on upskilling and reskilling employees

span.strong: D35 – Tailored trainings on curricula revision for key competences

a.span: D36 – TTT – TRAIN THE TRAINERS COURSE

strong.span: D37 – TTT – TRAIN THE TRAINERS webinar settings and contents
D38 – 18 TTT – TRAIN THE TRAINERS individual guides about the 4 PLCs topics

span.strong: Social Inclusion in TVET

strong.span: Digital Transformation in Education and Training

span.a: Digital Transformation of Learning Impact on organic agriculture
Final Unboxing the Multiannual Financial Framework

div.h3: WP2 - Quality Assurance and Impact Evaluation

span.strong: The objective of this WP is to assure the highest possible efficiency, relevance, impact and sustainability of the results and outcomes of the project by devising a concrete quality plan.

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%;

span.strong: D14 – QAE Quality Assurance and Evaluation Plan and D15 – QAIE Procedures
D17 – Interim Progress Evaluation Report (External Evaluator)
D18 – Final Evaluation Report (External Evaluator)
D19 – Final EVA

strong.span: SKILLNET aims to lead to an external large recognition of the work carried out adding further credit to Skillman network.

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%;

span.strong: D39 – WP Concept note

a.span: D40 – WP Standards for dissemination – Press kit

strong.span: D44 – Country and European Dissemination Plans 1’ release
D45 – Country and European Dissemination Plans last release

span.strong: D46 – International Conference 1 – SIF2020

strong.span: D47 – International Conference 2 – SIF2021
D51 – The Skillman.eu official video channel final report on SKILLNT contents
D53 – 200 informative elements
D54 – Social media data
D55 – Skillman.eu Annual online video contest 2020
D56 – Skillman.eu dissemination webinars

span.strong: The WP implements the first set of standard activities expected by the call that are deployed to raise the quality and attractiveness of the VET, to facilitate the access to the EU funds opportunities, to valorise the relevant EU tools and initiatives in the field of VET and finally, to engage new members into the Skillman sectoral network with an effective and proactive action.

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%;

span.strong: D22 – PLCs – PEER LEARNING CLUBS

div.span: 4 thematic permanent groups on specific topics composed by members belonging to the VET provider networks have been established. The PLCs cover the specific objectives of the projects as following:

table.style: height: 286px; width: 100%; background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838;

span.strong: Advanced Manufacturing Sector (Sectoral dimension)
Advocacy & Policy Influencing (Empowering dimension) (Social Equity dimension)

strong.span: WBL and standards (Work-based learning dimension) (Quality assurance dimension) (Curricular dimension)

span.strong: Train the trainers (Operational dimension)
D23 – PLCs animations during the Skillman International Annual Forum / Conferences
D24- 2 onsite trainings on EU funds opportunities

a.span: D25 – 18 webinars on EU funds opportunities

span.strong: D26 – 18 bulletins on EU funds opportunities

a.span: D27 – EU tools and initiatives desk service

div.h3: WP 6 - Exploitation and roll-out strategy implementation

strong.span: Exploitation, dissemination (WP6) and communication of results form together a crucial part of the SKILLNET strategy and make all partners committed to contribute to the success of this WP sharing their efforts, complementary networks and contacts at European and national level.

table.style: background-color: #ffffff; text-align: left; color: #383838; border: 2px solid #dce4e4; border-radius: 5px; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 20px; width: 100%; height: 661px;

strong.span: D57 – WP Concept note
D58 – Tools setting report
D60 – Action Plan first release
D61 – Action Plan last update

span.strong: D62 – Roll-out networking
